GSD.product_version: versions from v5.9 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
HID: elan: Fix potential double free in elan_input_configured

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 5291451851feeb66fd4bf0826710f482f3b1ab38, it was introduced in version v5.9 by commit b7429ea53d6c0936a0f10a5d64164f0aea440143. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: elan: Fix potential double free in elan_input_configured
